name: Ishaan Gautam
bio: Hello! I’m Ishaan Gautam. I am passionate about Frontend Web Development with 1+ years of focused experience in ReactJs/NextJs applications with expertise in reviewing client requirement prioritizes requirements and baseline project plan. I am a skilled Frontend web developer and master of popular JavaScript frameworks ReactJs. I am a quick learner and a team worker that gets the job done.
address: Mahesh Nagar, Ambala Cantt, Haryana, India.

workExperience.company: Tech Prastish Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
workExperience.jobDescription:
• Collaborate with web design and development team to create a new website for a tech startup, assisting with coding.
  • Delegate objectives to team of coders to facilitate time frame and meet the common vision of the project.
  • Assist design team with coding to create a user-friendly interface that is compatible across every major operating system.
  • Manage user feedback and perform system checkups to ensure the functionality of the website.
  • Oversee team of one junior coder and two interns.

projects.name: Online Chat Applications
projects.description: It's an online real-time chat application that has many features like online/offline status functionality, message read/unread functionality. User can send photos, videos and documents as well. User can create groups too.
projects.responsibilities:
• To Develop/Design as per requirement.
  • Handle UI and frontend of this project.
  • Making application real-time.
  • Bug fixes.

projects.name: ISOP Application
projects.description: It's an application in which user can access resources for ISOP certification. It has many features like 2 Factor authentication, multi-role authentication, Admin Panel.
projects.responsibilities:
• To Develop/Design using REST API’S.
  • Develop Admin Panel.
  • Knowledge sharing with the team and new members.
  • Bug fixes.
